block.p: BUSH-John ''Jack.'' Of Cotuit, MA. Husband of Virginia. Father of Paula Fagerholm, Patricia Scadding, Peter, Timothy and Richard Bush. Brother of Dr. Richard Bush. Grandfather of seven. A memorial service will be held in St. Peter's Episcopal Church, Osterville, MA, on Wednesday, July 15, at 10:30 AM. Donations to American Cancer Society, 1115 West Chestnut St., Suite 301, Brockton, MA 02401.
